cat.lump.ir.index

Class Abstracter

  • java.lang.Object
    • cat.lump.ir.index.Abstracter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Indexer, Querier

    public abstract class Abstracter
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the basic operation for indexing and querying a documents' index
    Author:
    albarron
